channel.title: Updates & News on MRinRT Symposium 2025
channel.description: Recent content in Updates & News on MRinRT Symposium 2025

item.title: Abstract Review Complete
item.description: Abstract review is now complete and authors have been notified of their abstract submission. Please take a look at the updated program.

item.title: Abstract Submission Closed
item.description: Abstract submission is now closed and the submitted abstracts are currently under review. The notifications will be sent out in early January. Thank you all for your participation.

item.title: Call for Abstracts
item.description:
We invite you to submit your original contributions in the field of MR simulation and MR-guided radiotherapy to the 11th MR in RT symposium, which will take place on April 14-16th, 2025 at NYU Langone Health campus in New York.

Important Dates

  • Abstract Submission Opens: August 22, 2024
  • Abstract Submission Deadline: December 2, 2024
  • Anticipated Notification Date: January 17, 2025

Abstract Information
